tutiffy.NAME: Citronix
tutiffy.MAIN_INFO: Developed an innovative application to manage lemon farms, providing advanced agricultural tracking and efficient RESTful services.

p_1.TEXT_2: The main goal of Citronix is to empower lemon farm managers with tools to track their agricultural activities, analyze data, and optimize productivity.
p_1.TEXT_3: The project includes core functionalities such as field monitoring, tree management, harvest planning, and sales tracking, ensuring end-to-end farm management.

p_2.TEXT_1: I worked on building a robust layered architecture that separates business logic, data management, and user interactions.
p_2.TEXT_2: This project enhanced my skills in backend development, RESTful API design, data validation, and database management. Additionally, I gained experience working with modern frameworks such as Spring Boot, Lombok, and Liquibase.
p_2.TEXT_3: The backend was developed using Spring Boot, ensuring efficient RESTful APIs and robust data validation. Liquibase was used for database migration management.

ASX.NAME: Hunter's League
ASX.MAIN_INFO: Designed and developed a platform to modernize hunting competition management, including participant registration, score tracking, and species consultation.

p_1.TEXT_1: The main objective of Hunter's League is to streamline the management of hunting competitions for clubs, participants, and administrators.
p_1.TEXT_2: The platform includes features like user registration, secure login, competition score management, and species database consultation.
p_1.TEXT_3: I implemented core functionalities such as CRUD operations for users and competitions, validation of user inputs, and password security using hashing techniques.

p_2.TEXT_1: The backend was built with Spring Boot, utilizing Liquibase for database migration and MapStruct for efficient DTO transformations. The application adheres to a layered architecture with centralized exception handling.
p_2.TEXT_2: Advanced features like competition score calculation based on specific criteria and multilingual support were also included.
p_2.TEXT_3: This project enhanced my expertise in backend development, security best practices, and creating efficient APIs. I also gained experience in managing complex business logic and validating data effectively.

maven.NAME: Evento
maven.MAIN_INFO: Developed an innovative platform to manage event reservations and ticketing, providing seamless experiences for users, organizers, and administrators.

p_1.TEXT_1: Evento aims to revolutionize event management by offering tools for discovering, reserving, and managing events efficiently.
p_1.TEXT_2: The platform provides distinct functionalities for users, organizers, and administrators, including user-friendly reservation systems, event creation tools, and administrative oversight.
p_1.TEXT_3: I implemented critical features such as user authentication, secure password resets, event filtering by category, and reservation ticket generation.

p_2.TEXT_1: For organizers, I developed tools to create and manage events, analyze reservation statistics, and manage approval workflows.
p_2.TEXT_2: Administrators benefit from category management, event validation, user restrictions, and access to platform-wide statistics.
p_2.TEXT_3: Technically, the project was built using Laravel, leveraging its robust features for CRUD operations, middleware validation, and Eloquent ORM for database management.

aboutMe.TITLE: About me
aboutMe.TECHNOLOGIES_SUB_TITLE: The basic technologies I use in my work
aboutMe.MY_CAREER: I'm a Full-stack developer with experience in building scalable and efficient web applications. My focus is on creating solutions that are both user-friendly and technically robust, adhering to industry best practices.
aboutMe.HOBBIES: Sports, exploring new technologies, traveling, and spending time learning about software trends. I also enjoy contributing to collaborative projects and maintaining an active lifestyle
aboutMe.DEVELOPMENT: My journey into development began with an interest in problem-solving and technology. I started with small projects and quickly discovered a passion for creating impactful software solutions. Over time, I honed my skills through education, internships, and self-learning, leading me to become a professional full-stack developer
aboutMe.QUALITIE_TEAMWORK_TEXT: Proficient in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality results.
aboutMe.QUALITIE_ADAPTABILITY_TEXT: ready to work in a dynamic environment and make technical decisions to achieve common goals.
aboutMe.QUALITIE_LEARNING_TEXT: committed to keeping up with industry trends and expanding technical skills.
